channel.title: NashBitDevs
channel.description: NashBitDevs is a community in the Nashville area for those interested in discussing and participating in the research and development of Bitcoin and related protocols and software.

item.title: NashBitDevs Socratic Seminar #11
item.author: Unknown
item.description:
Agenda

5:00pm Meet and greet and pizza
6:00pm Socratic seminar discussion of various bitcoin topics
7:30pm Futher hangout TBD

Location

The event is hosted at Bitcoin Park:

VIP conference room
1910 21st Ave S
Nashville, TN 37212

Map

Parking Info

Announcements

Join us for the NashBitDevs Socratic Seminar! A special thank you to our sponsors Bitcoin Park for hosting us and Bitrefill for providing the pizza.

Reminders

  • No photos, videos, audio recording
  • Chatham House Rule
  • Leave the meeting space as clean as you found it
  • Suggest topics for the next Socratic Seminar! Where to find topics?
  • Use bitcoin to pay for drinks from the cafe via the BTCPay server terminal

Raffle

  • Guess the next block nonce
    • Must be 8 hex characters, 0-9 and A-F, eg. 9A74E2B1
  • Winner(s) ranked by numeric closeness to next block nonce

Socratic Seminar

Events

  • Wed 5pm-8pm Bitcoin Park: Open House - Working in Bitcoin

News

  • Delving Bitcoin as a new place to dig deep on Bitcoin
  • BTCPay App announcement
  • Yikes! Tx with 19.82 BTC Fee
  • "River To Reduce Its Lightning Node Capacity Further by 48%"

New Work / Research

  • Running Fedimint on MutinyNet
  • 0xBEEFCAF3 FROST-Notebook
  • Combined CTV+APO proposal

Lightning Projects

  • LND Taproot channels merged
  • Matt Morehouse, "DoS: Fake Lightning Channels"

Bitcoin Projects

  • wallet: Add CoinGrinder coin selection algorithm, core #27877
  • Silent Payments: send and receive, core #27827
  • Make provably unsignable standard P2PK and P2MS outpoints unspendable, core #28400
  • p2p: Restrict self-advertisements with privacy networks to avoid fingerprinting, core #27411
  • p2p: Diversify automatic outbound connections with respect to networks, core #27213
  • (WIP) add a stratum v2 template provider, core #27854

item.title: NashBitDevs Socratic Seminar #10
item.author: Unknown
item.description:
Agenda

5:00pm Meet and greet and pizza
6:00pm Socratic seminar discussion of various bitcoin topics
7:30pm Futher hangout at TBD

Location

The event is hosted at Bitcoin Park:

VIP conference room
1910 21st Ave S
Nashville, TN 37212

Map

Parking Info

Announcements

Join us for the NashBitDevs Socratic Seminar! A special thank you to our sponsors Bitcoin Park and Bitrefill for food, refreshments and event space.

Reminders

  • No photos, videos, audio recording
  • Chatham House Rule
  • Leave the meeting space as clean as you found it
  • Suggest topics for the next Socratic Seminar! Where to find topics?

Raffle

  • Guess the next block nonce
    • Must be 8 hex characters, 0-9 and A-F, eg. 9A74E2B1
  • Winner(s) ranked by numeric closeness to next block nonce

Local Devs Show and Tell

  • Bitcoin Lightning car wash project
    • Jeff Wizer and Robert Parro
    • Shine Brite Car Wash is located at 211 N Main St Ashland City, TN 37015
    • Presentation slides

Socratic Seminar

Events

  • Wed 5pm-8pm Bitcoin Park: Open House - Bitcoin & Academia
  • Sept 6th-9th, Atlanta: TAB Conf 2023
  • Chaincode Labs is running 6-week seminars in Bitcoin Protocol Development and Lighting Protocol Development in September

News

  • OpenSats: Long-Term Support Program for Bitcoin Core Developers
  • OpenSats: First Wave of Bitcoin Grants
  • Bitcoin Dev Kit Foundation
  • Mutiny Wallet Open Beta
    • Android
    • How the Voltage LSP Enhances Privacy for Mutiny Wallet Users
  • Binance Completes Integration of Bitcoin (BTC) on Lightning Network, Opens Deposits and Withdrawals
    • When Taproot?

New Work / Research

  • Block: Update on the Mining Development Kit
  • Covenants in Bitcoin: A Useful Review Taxonomy by Rusty Russell
  • Libbitcoin's Bitcoin Explorer writeup
  • [Lightning-dev] Jamming Mitigation Dry Run
  • [Lightning-dev] option_simple_close for "unfailable" closing

Lightning Projects

  • Introducing the new Phoenix: a 3rd generation self-custodial Lightning wallet
  • Lightning Everywhere by Tony Giorgio
  • Lightning Dev Kit blog posts
    • Anchor Outputs Channels Are Here
    • Mutiny uses LDK to create the first lightning wallet for the web
  • HTLC Endorsement
  • Add quiescence negotiation eclair #2680

Bitcoin Projects

  • BDK 1.0 Roadmap
  • Introducing Frostsnap
  • [bitcoin-dev] Pull-req to remove the arbitrary limits on OP_Return outputs
    • "Remove arbitrary restrictions on OP_RETURN by default" core #28130
  • wallet: Add CoinGrinder coin selection algorithm core #27877

item.title: NashBitDevs Socratic Seminar #9

item.description:

6:00pm Socratic seminar discussion of various bitcoin topics
7:30pm What Bitcoin Did Live w/ Preston Pysh & Matt Odell

VIP conference room
1910 21st Ave S
Nashville, TN 37212

Map

Announcements

Join us for the NashBitDevs Socratic Seminar! A special thank you to our sponsors Bitcoin Park and Bitrefill for food, refreshments and event space.

  • Leave the meeting space as clean as you found it

Raffle

  • Guess the next block nonce
    • Must be 8 hex characters, 0-9 and A-F, eg. 9A74E2B1
  • Winner(s) ranked by numeric closeness to next block nonce

Socratic Seminar

Events

  • Wed 5pm-8pm Bitcoin Park: Open House - ⚡ LIGHTNING ⚡
  • Thr-Fri 10am-4pm Bitcoin Park: The Power of Lightning Summit 2023 - (Ticket Required)
  • Sat-Sun 10am-4pm Bitcoin Park: AI + Fedi-Mods Workshop

News

  • "Custodian Prime Trust suspends withdrawals following sale failure"

New Work / Research

  • MAKE 12 WORDS THE STANDARD by Foundation
  • Passphrases Are Not the Solution for Bitcoin Custody by Hugo Nguyen
  • Block's Bitkey "Hardware Wallet" will Violate your Privacy and Security by Zach Herbert
  • Codex32
    • BDK Issue #1027 "Support for codex32/BIP93 seed import"

Lightning Projects

  • Announcing LDK Node
  • Voltage Surge
    • Every Company Will Be A Lightning Company
  • Securing a $100M Lightning node
  • VLS (the Validating Lightning Signer) Beta release

Bitcoin Projects

  • PUTTING THE B IN BTC by Anthony Towns
  • Coldcard Miniscript
  • PDK Payjoin Dev Kit

item.description:

1910 21st Ave S
Nashville, TN 37212

Map

  • Guess the next block nonce
    • Must be 8 hex characters, 0-9 and A-F, eg. 9A74E2B1

Events

  • Workshop - Coffee, Bitcoin, + Accounting w/ Joe Wood, Satoshi Pacioli Accounting, March 15, 9am
  • Open House - Economics & Incentives of Bitcoin, March 15, 5pm
  • The Power of Lightning Summit 2023, July 13-14, 2023
  • Bitcoin 2023, May 18-20, 2023, Miami Beach

News

  • BlueWallet is Sunsetting Lndhub.io
  • Applications for Summer of Bitcoin are now open

  • Coinstr, Bitcoin spending policy and signature orchestration using Taproot and Nostr

    • TheBlueMatt on Twitter

Lightning Dev Kit
  • LDK 0.0.114
  • Limit the number of pending un-funded inbound channel LDK#1988
  • create_invoice_from_channelmanager variant with description hash support LDK#1280

Bitcoin Projects

Bitcoin Core
  • bitcoin-inquisition and Heretical Deployments
  • p2p, validation: Don't download witnesses for assumed-valid blocks when running in prune mode bitcoincore#27050
Bitcoin Dev Kit

  • ":Fedipool: Fedimint Could Mitigate Bitcoin Mining Pool Concerns"
Ordinals
  • Inscriptions are finally ready for Bitcoin mainnet with ord version 0.4.0 release
  • Eric Wall's fully onchain-inscribed (360kb) Bitcoin NFT and inscription transaction

item.title: NashBitDevs Socratic Seminar #0
item.author: Unknown
item.description:
Agenda

7:00pm Socratic Seminar where we review various Bitcoin topics

Location

The event is hosted at Bitcoin Park:

VIP conference room
1910 21st Ave S
Nashville, TN 37212

Map

Announcements

We are excited to introduce our very first Socratic Seminar! A special thank you to our sponsors Bitcoin Park and Bitrefill for food, refreshments and event space.

Reminders

  • No photos, videos, audio recording
  • Chatham House Rule
  • Leave the meeting space as clean as you found it
  • Suggest topics for the next Socratic Seminar! Where to find topics?

Socratic Seminar

News and Events

  • BP Open House #1 Oct. 5
  • Bitcoin Chattanooga Oct. 8
  • Nashbitcoiners #14 Oct. 12
  • TABconf Oct. 12-15
  • Bitcoin Designathon 2022 Oct. 12-23
  • Legends of Lightning Oct. 11 - Dec. 7

Network Stats

  • mempool.space
  • clarkmoody.com
  • Murch "Bitcoin Supply Inflation"

New Work / Research

  • nckler "Approaching stable MuSig2 Spec"
    • BIP MuSig2
  • LN "Channel Jamming Book"
  • elsirion "FediMint public signet instance"
  • calle "Cashu a Chaumian Ecash wallet and mint"
  • renepickhardt "The Power of Valves for Better Flow Control, ..."

Bitcoin Projects

Bitcoin Core
  • Bitcoin Core 24.0 Release Candidate
    • "Testing Bitcoin Core 24.0 Release Candidates" Sept. 28
  • "Wallet: Add foreign_outputs metadata to support CoinJoin transactions" #25991
    • Bitcoin Optech "Coinjoin"
Bitcoin Dev Kit
  • Add waste metric for coin selection #558
    • Bitcoin Optech "Coin selection"
    • Murch "What does "Waste Metric" mean in the context of Coin Selection?"

Lightning Projects

Eclair
  • Add initial support for async payment trampoline relay #2435
    • "Add the ability to hold HTLCs before forwarding (FEAT 52/53)" #989
    • "[lightning-dev] A Mobile Lightning User Goes to Pay a Mobile Lightning User..."
Lightning Dev Kit
  • BOLT 12 offer encoding and building #1719
    • Bitcoin Optech "Offers"
  • Support filtered blocks in lightning-block-sync #1706
    • Bitcoin Optech "Compact block filters"
  • Announcing Rapid Gossip Sync
    • rapid-gossip-sync-server
